sen.j: 秀山十種（しゅうざん じっしゅ）は、中村吉右衛門 (初代)が撰じた播磨屋 (歌舞伎)の中村吉右衛門のお家芸。
sen.e: Shuzan Jusshu refers to the specialty plays of Kichiemon NAKAMURA of Harimaya (kabuki) selected by Kichiemon the first.
Shuzan Jusshu refers to the specialty plays of Kichiemon NAKAMURA of Harimaya (kabuki) selected by Kichiemon NAKAMURA the first.
sen.cmt: 「Kichiemon the first」 を「Kichiemon NAKAMURA the first」に修正しました。
sen.e: Shuzan Jusshu refers to the specialty plays of Kichiemon NAKAMURA of Harimaya (kabuki) selected by Kichiemon NAKAMURA the first.

sen.j: 「秀山」は中村吉右衛門の俳号である。
sen.e: "Shuzan" is Kichiemon's haigo (the pen name of a haiku poet).
"Shuzan" is Kichiemon's haigo (the pen name of a haiku poet).
